findings: Fall protection compliant on Tower C upper floors. Two workers missing safety vests at ground level. Housekeeping needs improvement at loading dock area. Fire extinguisher at trailer expired.
corrective_actions: Issued replacement vests. Cleaned loading dock area. Replaced expired fire extinguisher. Added housekeeping to daily checklist.

findings: All crane certifications current. Excavator daily logs complete. One frayed sling found on rigging rack. Generator grounding verified. Compressor relief valve tested OK.
corrective_actions: Removed damaged sling from service and tagged for disposal. Ordered replacement. Updated rigging inventory.

findings: Fire extinguishers on Resort floors 1-18 inspected and current. Hot work permit area on floor 22 lacked fire watch. Welding screens not properly positioned in two areas.
corrective_actions: Assigned dedicated fire watch to all hot work areas. Repositioned welding screens. Reinforced hot work permit procedures at morning meeting.

findings: Port Terminal container yard has uneven terrain creating trip hazards. Barricade tape around open excavation deteriorated. Emergency assembly point signage missing at north gate.
corrective_actions: Graded and compacted trip hazard areas. Replaced all barricade tape with rigid barricading. Installed reflective assembly point signage at all gates.

findings: Manitowoc crawler crane annual inspection complete - all systems functional. New wire rope installed after load test failure. All mobile equipment pre-op logs current. Boom lift certifications verified.
corrective_actions: No corrective actions required. Documented new wire rope installation and load test results. Updated maintenance schedule.

findings: Foster Medical Center site perimeter fencing secure. Excavation shoring in place and inspected. All workers wearing proper PPE. Dust control measures effective. Noise monitoring within limits.
corrective_actions: Minor recommendation to add additional dust suppression at south access point during dry conditions. Scheduled water truck rotation.

findings: Pre-task plan for Tower C curtain wall installation reviewed. All workers signed JSA. Fall protection anchor points verified by engineer. Weather conditions acceptable. Material staging organized.
corrective_actions: Noted wind speed monitoring required during panel installation. Set 25 mph threshold for stopping glass panel lifts.

findings: Museum Park Tower B scaffolding inspection post-wind event. 40% of scaffold boards displaced. Toe boards missing on 3 levels. Guardrails intact. Scaffold frame connections tight.
corrective_actions: Replaced all displaced scaffold boards. Installed missing toe boards. Added wind speed monitoring protocol. Reduced work height during high wind warnings.

findings: Hardy Toll Road paving equipment inspection. Asphalt paver calibration verified. Roller compaction pattern documented. Haul trucks inspected - one with cracked windshield identified.
corrective_actions: Removed truck with cracked windshield from service. Scheduled replacement. All other equipment cleared for continued operation.

findings: Sugar Land retail building shell inspection. Temporary stairs installed and compliant. Opening protection in floor decks adequate. Material storage organized. One missing guardrail at elevator shaft.
corrective_actions: Installed temporary guardrail at elevator shaft opening. Added to daily inspection checklist. Briefed all trades on floor opening protection requirements.

findings: Kemp Petrochemical fire suppression system pre-commissioning check. Foam proportioning system calibrated. Deluge valves tested. Fire water pump started and ran for 30 minutes. All hose stations accessible.
corrective_actions: Minor recommendation to add additional foam concentrate storage. Current supply meets minimum but should have 150% reserve for extended operations.

findings: Drake Waterfront marine bulkhead area inspection. Dewatering pumps operating continuously. Cofferdam seepage noted at two joints. Workers in marine environment lacking life vests. No rescue boat on standby.
corrective_actions: CRITICAL: Immediately provided life vests to all marine workers. Positioned rescue boat at cofferdam. Sealed cofferdam joints with additional welding. Assigned dedicated marine safety watch.

findings: Annual company-wide safety program review. 2025 EMR at 0.82. Total recordable rate 2.1 vs industry 3.4. One fatality in 2024 requiring ongoing corrective actions. Training compliance at 94%.
corrective_actions: Updated safety manual with post-fatality lessons learned. Mandated forklift seatbelt interlocks on all company equipment. Increased night shift supervision ratios. Added quarterly safety stand-downs.

findings: Quarterly fleet vehicle inspection. 18 vehicles inspected. 2 with overdue oil changes. 1 with worn brake pads. All fire extinguishers current. DOT logs complete on CDL vehicles.
corrective_actions: Scheduled overdue oil changes for weekend. Replaced brake pads on F-350 #2. Updated preventive maintenance tracking spreadsheet.

findings: Woodlands Village site prep inspection. Erosion control measures adequate after recent rain. Silt fences intact. Construction entrance stabilized. One area of standing water near material storage.
corrective_actions: Pumped standing water and re-graded area for drainage. Added additional stone at material storage pad. Scheduled erosion control maintenance.
